headline: Danaher to Present at Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference
summary: Danaher Corporation (NYSE: DHR) announced that President and Chief Executive Officer, Rainer M. Blair, will be presenting at the Evercore ISI HealthCONx Conference in Coral Gables, Florida on Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 3:25 p.m. ET. The event will be simultaneously webcast on www.danaher.com.

headline: Invesco Health Care Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: Invesco Health Care Fund underperformed its benchmark. Despite earlier signs of improving trends, our health care outlook is bearish. Read more here.

headline: Veralto: Premium Multiples For A Premium Business
summary: Veralto's premium valuation is justified by its accelerating organic growth and strategic investments. Learn why VLTO stock is a Hold.
